name: Mastermind
description: The user accepted at least 10 help requests

name: Curious
description: The user addressed at least 10 help requests

name: Events master
description: The user has personnaly organized at least 5 events. For now this feature is only available to the admin

name: Green hero
description: The user has consumed less electricity than 80% of users other a period of 1 month

name: Root
description: The user has spent 10 hours working in the coworking space. This is a reward for seniority

name: Seedling
description: The user has spent 100 hours working in the coworking space. This is a reward for seniority

name: Tree
description: The user has spent 1000 hours working in the coworking space. This is a reward for seniority
